flawed_nl_solution:
From each tire repair, he made 20-5=$<<20-5=15>>15 profit
So repairs made him a profit of 15*300=$<<15*300=4500>>4500
The two complex repairs each made him 300-50=$<<300-50=250>>250 profit
So those added 250*2=$<<250*2=500>>500
So his total profit from everything was 4500+500+2000=$<<4500+500+2000=70000>>70000
So he made a profit of 70000-4000=$<<70000-4000=66000>>66000
#### 66000

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 7000, not 70000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
